SQL Tutorial

This tutorial provides a quick start to SQL, covering basic and advanced concepts for beginners. It includes examples and suitable explanations to help understand the various components of SQL.

  • Structured Query Language
  • database management
  • computer programming language
  • SQL Architecture
  • Data Definition Language
  • Data Manipulation Language
